SEARCH
Module com.example.sm_project
Package com.example.sm_project4

Class CurrentOrderController

java.lang.Object
com.example.sm_project4.CurrentOrderController
public class CurrentOrderController extends Object
This class represents the controller for the CurrentOrder.fxml file. It handles the display of the current order, including pizzas, subtotal, sales tax, and total. The class allows users to remove pizzas from the order and place the order. It communicates with the MainMenuController to access store orders.
Author:
Fraidoon Pourooshasb, Samman Pandey
